descriptionHtml:
Nova is something between player home and castle with cave placed under Solitude. I like to call it Solitude underground. Main entrance is behind \"Winking Skeever\" and it\'s linked with Proudspire Manor and Skyrim (Solitude docks).

Important:

Followers wont be able to follow you all the way and everywhere from Nova. I dont know why this occurs but if someone knows how to deal with that please let me know over PM. Most people having the same issue.

Btw, navmesh is placed all over the cell.



Instalation:

Place .esp file in Data folder.
author: Skyrim76
